experiences.description: Led a cross-functional team of engineers, designers, and marketers to define and launch new features for our flagship AI-powered marketing platform. Conducted market research, analyzed user feedback through surveys, A/B testing, and user interviews, and collaborated with engineering to translate user needs into actionable product specifications. Drove a 20% increase in user engagement through the implementation of personalized recommendations. Managed the product roadmap, ensuring alignment with the company's overall vision and strategic objectives. Utilized JIRA for project tracking and Confluence for documentation and knowledge sharing.

Consulted with clients across various industries to develop and implement data-driven strategies. Performed in-depth data analysis to identify key business insights and opportunities for improvement. Created compelling presentations and reports to communicate findings and recommendations to senior management.  Developed data governance frameworks to ensure data quality and compliance with industry regulations. Some projects involved increasing sales efficiency for retail clients through predictive analysis, and optimizing marketing campaign spending.

Supported the marketing team in the development and execution of marketing campaigns for a new product line. Conducted market research and competitive analysis. Assisted in the creation of marketing materials, including brochures, presentations, and social media content. Analyzed campaign performance and provided recommendations for improvement.

education.description: Specialized in machine learning, statistical modeling, and data visualization.  Completed a thesis on the application of deep learning techniques to natural language processing.
Focused on strategy, marketing, and finance. Participated in case competitions and leadership development programs. GPA: 3.8/4.0
